data.comment: A total of 4512 spectators is reported.
The match is underway at VTB Arena.
Mikhail Vilkov awards Akhmat Grozny a goal kick.
In the minute 2, Dinamo Moscow are coming forward and Nikola Moro gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Akhmat Grozny have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow close to the penalty box.
In the minute 5, Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Akhmat Grozny awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Moscow Akhmat Grozny attack through Ismael Silva. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 7, It's a goal kick for the home team in Moscow.
Miroslav Bogosavac of Akhmat Grozny gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Dinamo Moscow at VTB Arena.
In the minute 9, In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow.
Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in the half of Akhmat Grozny.
In the minute 12, Mikhail Vilkov signals a throw-in for Akhmat Grozny, close to Dinamo Moscow's area.
Dinamo Moscow have been awarded a corner by Mikhail Vilkov.
Dinamo Moscow drives forward and Vyacheslav Grulev gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Akhmat Grozny goal kick.
Free kick Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 17, Throw-in Akhmat Grozny.
Ball safe as Dinamo Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Akhmat Grozny's Ismael Silva gets in a shot on goal at VTB Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 19, Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
Akhmat Grozny advance rapidly upfield but Mikhail Vilkov blows for offside.
In the minute 20, Mikhail Vilkov awards the home team a throw-in.
Dinamo Moscow have been awarded a corner by Mikhail Vilkov.
Akhmat Grozny awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny in the half of Dinamo Moscow.
Akhmat Grozny's Bernard Berisha breaks free at VTB Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Mikhail Vilkov awards Dinamo Moscow a goal kick.
In the minute 24, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in the half of Akhmat Grozny.
Dinamo Moscow's Dmitri Skopintsev misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 26, Ball goes out of play for a Akhmat Grozny goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Akhmat Grozny in Moscow.
Free kick Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 27, Anton Shvets is booked for the away team.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Dinamo Moscow have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 31, Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
Sergei Slepov (Dinamo Moscow) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Nikola Moro (Dinamo Moscow) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 33, Dinamo Moscow have been awarded a corner by Mikhail Vilkov.
Sebastian Szymanski (Dinamo Moscow) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Dinamo Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 34, Akhmat Grozny's Maksim Maksimovich Nenahov gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Dinamo Moscow have a goal kick.
Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 38, Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
Dinamo Moscow are caught offside.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 40, Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow.
Akhmat Grozny to take a throw-in in Dinamo Moscow territory.
Akhmat Grozny push forward at VTB Arena and Vladimir Iljin gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Dinamo Moscow defence.
In the minute 41, Mikhail Vilkov signals a Akhmat Grozny throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half.
Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny at VTB Arena.
Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
In the minute 43, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Dmitri Skopintsev.
Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Moscow.
In the minute 45, Dmitri Skopintsev has recovered and rejoins the match in Moscow.
Free kick Dinamo Moscow.
Mikhail Vilkov will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
The first half has been concluded at VTB Arena.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Can Dinamo Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Akhmat Grozny's half?
Dinamo Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
At VTB Arena, Vladimir Iljin has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 48, Mikhail Vilkov waits before resuming play because Ivan Ordets for Dinamo Moscow is still down.
Dinamo Moscow's Ivan Ordets looks ok and returns to the pitch.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 50, Mikhail Vilkov awards the home team a throw-in.
Important block from the Akhmat Grozny defence as Vyacheslav Grulev fires in a strike for Dinamo Moscow.
Can Akhmat Grozny get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half?
In the minute 53, Can Akhmat Grozny capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Dinamo Moscow's half?
Dinamo Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 55, Akhmat Grozny needs to be cautious. Dinamo Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
Andrey Talalaev is making the team's first substitution at VTB Arena with Evgeny Kharin replacing Marat Bystrov.
Akhmat Grozny make their second substitution with Andres Ponce replacing Vladimir Iljin.
In the minute 56, In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Great shot from Dinamo Moscow's Daniil Lesovoy but he is denied by the crossbar.
Goal kick for Akhmat Grozny at VTB Arena.
In the minute 58, Zoran Nizic is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
In the minute 60, Zoran Nizic returns to the field for Akhmat Grozny after picking up a slight injury.
The match at VTB Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Ismael Silva, who is down injured.
Akhmat Groznyâ€™s Ismael Silva is on his feet again at VTB Arena.
Throw-in high up the field for Akhmat Grozny in Moscow.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in the half of Dinamo Moscow.
Akhmat Grozny have been awarded a corner by Mikhail Vilkov.
Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
In the minute 64, Akhmat Grozny have been awarded a corner by Mikhail Vilkov.
Akhmat Grozny have been awarded a corner by Mikhail Vilkov.
Bernard Berisha (Akhmat Grozny) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Dinamo Moscow defenders.
In the minute 64, Dinamo Moscow's Clinton N'Jie breaks free at VTB Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Moscow.
Vyacheslav Grulev (Dinamo Moscow) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 66, Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
Vyacheslav Grulev (Dinamo Moscow) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 68, Ball goes out of play for a Akhmat Grozny goal kick.
Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Akhmat Grozny.
Goal kick for Dinamo Moscow at VTB Arena.
In the minute 70, Zaurbek Pliev is on a sub for Sergei Slepov for Dinamo Moscow.
In Moscow, Vyacheslav Grulev of Dinamo Moscow is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Moscow to check on Artem Timofeev, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 73, Dinamo Moscow have been awarded a corner by Mikhail Vilkov.
Artem Timofeev returns to the field for Akhmat Grozny after picking up a slight injury.
Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny close to the penalty box.
In the minute 74, Akhmat Grozny have a goal kick.
Mikhail Vilkov awards Akhmat Grozny a goal kick.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Miroslav Bogosavac (Akhmat Grozny) gets a yellow card.
Mikhail Vilkov awards Akhmat Grozny a goal kick.
Georgi Melkadze is replacing Ismael Silva for the away team.
In the minute 77, Andrey Talalaev (Akhmat Grozny) is making a fourth substitution, with Oleg Ivanov replacing Bernard Berisha.
Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny in the half of Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 79, Ball safe as Dinamo Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Miroslav Bogosavac (Akhmat Grozny) has been booked for the second time by the referee and is off!
In the minute 81, Dinamo Moscow are pushing forward but Sebastian Szymanski's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Moscow.
Dinamo Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 82, Artem Timofeev is booked for the away team.
Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
Dinamo Moscow to take a throw-in in Akhmat Grozny territory.
In the minute 84, Free kick Akhmat Grozny.
Throw-in Dinamo Moscow.
Mikhail Vilkov signals a Akhmat Grozny throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny at VTB Arena.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow at VTB Arena.
Dinamo Moscow have been awarded a corner by Mikhail Vilkov.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 87, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in the half of Dinamo Moscow.
Daniil Lesovoy (Dinamo Moscow) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 87, The home team replace Sebastian Szymanski with Sylvester Igboun.
Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 89, Mikhail Vilkov signals a Dinamo Moscow throw-in in Akhmat Grozny's half.
Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
In Moscow Dinamo Moscow drive forward through Clinton N'Jie. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Akhmat Grozny.
Georgi Melkadze for Akhmat Grozny gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Dinamo Moscow goal kick.
Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Dinamo Moscow push forward at VTB Arena and Sylvester Igboun gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Akhmat Grozny defence.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-0.
Ivan Ordets scores with a header and the home team now lead 1-0.
That's a fine assist from Daniil Fomin.
Ivan Ordets (Dinamo Moscow) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Lechii Sadulaev is replacing Anton Shvets for Akhmat Grozny at VTB Arena.
The home team have replaced Vyacheslav Grulev with Charles Kabore. This is the third substitution made today by Kirill Novikov.
